Name: Caf√© Del Mondo
Review Text: Please this restaurant need to be closed. They are racist. If you have any moral do not visit this place. They told me and my family  we have to leave, because they can not tolerate 3 brown colored people to their other customers. Don't support them. They are living in the 18. Century still!!

Name: Caf√© Del Mondo
Review Text: Loved this venue! Came across Cafe del Mondo randomly, I was not disappointed! Live music and tasty drinks! I would definitely recommend. I will be going back when i'm next down in Amsterdam.

Name: Caf√© Del Mondo
Review Text: This place is amazing, amazing beer and wonderful staff. Should be on anyone's shortlist when visiting Amsterdam. Ajax fans welcome.

Name: Caf√© Del Mondo
Review Text: When next door Loosje's terrace is very crowded, I used to go to Del Mondo for my double espresso in the morning. Strangely enough the prices vary considerably; A nice girl waitress charged me 2,20 Euro for a cup, while next day a rather ‚Ä¶
